articles.title: 'Too poor to afford a ticket': Fan manages to catch glimpse of Jay Chou in concert from 'Cat 0' seats - AsiaOne
articles.description: No money to pay for a Jay Chou concert ticket? No problem. It seems concertgoers have found a hack to still be in on the action at the Singapore National Stadium, despite not holding a ticket. "When you're too poor to afford a Jay Chou ticket", captioned one …
articles.content:

articles.title: Salt rising, river slowing: Climate change drives harsh realities for people in the Mekong Delta - CNA
articles.description: Asia’s Great Climate Frontiers: Southern Vietnam is the country’s food bowl. But water shortages are driving farmers to despair, with many of them opting to move to other provinces to find work.
articles.content: An Giang University is doing extensive research on water use and climate change to boost the resilience of rice farmers. A growing technique called Alternative Wetting and Drying (AWD) aims to reduce… [+1149 chars]
